title: AI Research and Writing Tool • Lede
introduction: Lede is engineered to write like humans do. Unlike most AI writers, we conduct real-time research to capture the latest information, followed by distilling this data into key insights. We then craft your article based on the summarized research notes. This method allows you to tackle any subject matter confidently — even those outside your expertise — with links to the original sources.
